name: ORION: Prelude - Ultimate Edition
summary: ORION: Prelude (ULTIMATE EDITION) automatically unlocks ALL Skills & 210 Progression levels in addition to ALL store items including: Hats, Armors, Capes, Saber Colors, Dinosaur Skins and more! 'ORION: Prelude' is an indie Sci-Fi shooter (FPS/TPS) that seamlessly blends together incredible visuals and addictive combat.
